wikipedia_page.main: Lord Michael John Henry Pratt (15 August 1946 – 3 September 2007) was a scion of the British aristocracy. An eccentric, he is best known as the author of several historical books.

response: Lord Michael Pratt was a younger son of the fifth Marquess.
*Lord Michael Pratt, 61, British writer and aristocrat.

Notable former members of the club include John le Carré, Alexander, 7th Marquess of Bath, Lord Michael Pratt (a former Secretary of the Grid), and Prime Minister David Cameron (President of the Grid 1987–1988).
